long_description: The Swiss Army Mountaineer knife offers precision-crafted quality and high durability, so you can be prepared for tasks requiring a sharp blade and basic tools on your next high-altitude adventure. Tough plastic handle scales, aluminum housing and stainless-steel components last for years of outdoor use. Includes large and small blades, corkscrew, bottle opener, large and small standard screwdrivers, wire stripper, can opener, scissors, reamer and multipurpose hook. The Swiss Army Mountaineer knife also features a nail file, nail cleaner, metal file, metal saw, tweezers, toothpick and key rin.
short_description: The Swiss Army Mountaineer knife offers precision-crafted quality and high durability, so you can be prepared for tasks requiring a sharp blade and basic tools on your next high-altitude adventure.
